Key Match Events: David Fry hit the first go-ahead, pinch hit blast in franchise history for the Cleveland Guardians
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Stephen Vogt praised David Fry for his contributions to the team this year
Catcher Austin Hedges called David Fry's night a 'coming-out party'
Miscellaneous Highlights: David Fry was a Player To Be Named Later in a trade from the Milwaukee Brewers to the Cleveland Guardians
Fry's home run and bunt helped the Guardians avoid elimination in the ALDS
Others: Rajai Davis, a former player, was in attendance and spoke about his own experience as a postseason hero
The article mentions the Guardians' long drought without a postseason victory
